units.title: Earth & Space Sciences — AC9S7U02 — Sun–Earth–Moon phenomena
units.whyThis: You’ve already learned some Earth & Space Sciences, so this Y7 activity is the next step to extend it.

units.title: Physical Sciences — AC9S7U03 — Forces (incl. friction & gravity)
units.whyThis: You’ve already learned some Physical Sciences, so this Y7 activity is the next step to extend it.

units.title: Chemical Sciences — AC9S7U04 — Pure substances vs mixtures
units.whyThis: You’ve already learned some Chemical Sciences, so this Y7 activity is the next step to extend it.

careers.title: Environmental Compliance Officer
careers.whyThis: Environmental Compliance Officer uses the Earth & Space Sciences you’ve already been learning. To move towards Environmental Compliance Officer you still need inquiry skills like communicating. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what Environmental Compliance Officer involves. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Environmental Compliance Officer now and understand what to work towards.
